full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,PHYAG RDOR GOS SNGON CAN GYI SGRUB THABS DANG RGYAL CHEN RNAM THOS SRAS LA BRTEN NAS BYIN 'BEBS DANG GA-YANG 'GUG BYED TSUL BKLAG CHOG MA GSER 'OD GA-YANG SKYOB KYI 'DON THABS DANG BCAS PA RNAMS BZHUGS SO, , *, ,DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE GOS SNGON CAN GYI SGRUB THABS DNGOS GRUB GTER MDZOD CES BYA BA NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE GOS SNGON CAN GYI SGRUB THABS DNGOS GRUB GTER MDZOD CES BYA BA 'DI NI RNAM SRAS KYI CHO GA'I YAN LAG TU ZHVA SER COD PAN 'DZIN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS SBYAR BA'O, ,)
